snippet: Reports of continuing improvement in the sectors reinforced data showing the economy was strong at the beginning of 2012.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says its manufacturing index rose to 54.1 in January from 53.1 in December; Commerce Department says construction spending rose 1.5 percent in December, to seasonally adjusted annual rate of $816.4 billion, highest level in 20 months; ADP reports private sector employment rose by 170,000 in January from December.
lead_paragraph: Reports of continuing improvement in the sectors reinforced data showing the economy was strong at the beginning of 2012.
